Name: There Is No Tomorrow: Better Edition
About the game: Hi Player, this is the developer of There Is No Tomorrow. I am a solo developer that made this overly ambitious game that took me 3 years which to be honest, is a tedious process to develop it because it is simply being too ambitious. Due to the scale of the game, there will be hidden bugs that me and my testers will miss. If you encounter any bugs, please do use the discussion forum so i can fix it, thanks. This game has a new big update in June 2021 which fixed and improved a lot of previous issues. Best playing with keyboard and Mouse. Now added with xbox controller support but still in Beta. About An Indie game made by one man, There Is No Tomorrow is a 3rd person action-adventure survival horror game with a talking doll companion. Leon traveled into the future where humans are at a brink of extinction due to the mysterious creatures known as 'RA' that have populated the world. Choose your approach, Stealth or Action with multiple story endings. Gameplay will take 4-5 hours, longer if you are into collecting 'sketches' and achievements. Story The game centers on protagonist Leon as he time traveled into the future world full of evil and hostile creatures that he never saw before. Played in a 3rd person perspective, players battle monster-like enemies, including humans using guns and melee weapons or stealth their way through to progress the levels. Being a story-driven adventure game, players can choose between stealth or action approach while some levels require to solve mysterious puzzles. Gameplay The game is played from a third-person perspective in which scavenging for items and learning how to stealth is crucial in surviving the dangers of the game. The game's most common enemy is very fast and deals high damage, Players will most likely be dead after just a few hits. As a regular student, Leon must learn to survive in this adventure. Leon, the protagonist, needs to make use of the environment and things he may find in order to survive. Some of the items include melee weapons, steel traps, various distraction things, and ammunition. FEATURES ⦁ Stealth & Action gameplay mechanics. Choose your approach. ⦁ 4-5 hours of gameplay. ⦁ A heavily Story-driven adventure game with all animated cutscenes. ⦁ A variety of methods to kill or take-down your enemies ⦁ Enemies consist of both monsters and humans. ⦁ Challenging and mysterious puzzles to solve. ⦁ Different endings depending on the choices you made. ⦁ Hard mode for hardcore players (You only live once)
